title: Compassion or Codependence: How can we cultivate compassion without being codependent?
description:
Chelsea and Judah kick off the first episode by examining the difference between compassion and codependence. In a world that rightfully encourages compassion, how can we remain empathetic to others without becoming codependent?
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
